question: In the last 24 hours, what unique top-level windows (app + window title) were visible, and for each what were the first_seen and last_seen screenshot times?
In the last 24 hours, what unique URL hosts/domains were visible on screen, and what was the last_seen time for each?
In the last 24 hours, list each distinct error, toast, or dialog message that appeared and its first_seen, last_seen, and total_visible_duration, merging gaps less than or equal to 30 seconds.
In the last 24 hours, what button labels did we click (UIA role button), and what was the most recent click time for each label?
In the last 24 hours, which UIA element (role plus name) held focus the most total time, and what was that total focused duration in seconds?
Between the latest processed 60-minute window start and end, how many frames contained the text snippet "invoice", and what was total visible duration when gaps of 30 seconds or less are merged?
In the last 24 hours, what was the longest continuous time the foreground app was Slack, and what were the start and end screenshot times?
In the last 24 hours, during which single 5-minute interval did the active window change the most, and how many changes occurred?
In the last 24 hours, what was the median time between mouse clicks in seconds using HID events?
Identify a verified instance where we typed token "incident" and then the UI reflected it. What was the latency from last keypress to first visible occurrence in milliseconds?
After the most recent use of shortcut Ctrl+K in the last 24 hours, what immediate UI change occurred within 3 seconds (window title, app, or URL before versus after)?
Find a verified click on UIA element named "View details" that caused navigation. What were the URLs before and after and what was the delta time?
What was the most recent save or export dialog seen, what filename was shown, and when was it dismissed?
Identify the most recent modal dialog lifecycle: when it appeared, when it disappeared, what its title was, and what action closed it (click versus key).
Find the most recent time a toggle or checkbox changed state. What was the label, old state, new state, and triggering HID event?
At the latest processed screenshot time, what were the primary visible windows on the left half versus right half of a 7680x2160 canvas?
In the last 24 hours, how many times did a new top-level window first appear with centroid in the top-right quadrant, and what was the most recent instance?
What was the most recent notification or banner observed? Provide text, screenshot time, and screen bounding box.
Find an instance where cursor moved from x < 3840 to x >= 3840 without clicking. Provide start and end positions and times.
At the latest processed screenshot time, was any visible scrollable container not fully shown (scrollbar not at end)? If yes, identify role, name, and scroll position.
In the last 24 hours within app Outlook, what were the minimum and maximum currency-like amounts shown and when did each occur?
Identify the most recent time a percentage value changed on screen. What changed and what was the time delta?
What is the most recent non-overlay date shown on screen and what UI context did it belong to (window, app, or element)?
In the last 24 hours, how many time-of-day strings like 3:30 PM were visible that referred to times after the screenshot timestamp on that frame?
Pick a visible identifier matching regex [A-Z]{3}-[0-9]{3}. When did it first appear and did it reappear later? Provide first_seen and last_seen.
At the latest processed screenshot time, what was the full UIA ancestry path of the focused element as role and name pairs?
Find a click event that produced no visible effect within 3 seconds: no window title change, no URL change, and no significant text delta. Provide clicked element and time.
Identify a UI value that changed without any HID input within plus or minus 5 seconds. What changed and when?
Find an instance where a text field value jumped by at least 12 characters within 2 seconds, suggesting paste behavior. What field and when?
In the last 24 hours, which UIA role received the most clicks and what was the count?
Reconstruct the minimal action sequence that led from seeing marker text "Open Invoice" to seeing marker text "State changed" within 20 minutes.
Find the most recent search where a term was entered and submitted. What was the term and what was the top visible result title?
For a verified scrolling session lasting at least 20 seconds, what was total scroll wheel delta and net scroll position change of target container?
Did we perform a copy then paste sequence (Ctrl+C then Ctrl+V) within 10 minutes? If yes, when and what was the paste target field or app?
Identify the most recent time a new tab or new window was opened via keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+T or Ctrl+N). What was resulting window title or URL and when?
Find a tooltip that appeared after hover with no click. What was tooltip text and when did it appear and disappear?
Find the most recent context menu opened via right-click. What was the menu title if any, and which item was selected?
Identify an element where UIA name or value disagreed with rendered text in the same bounding region. What were the two strings and when?
Using the temporal vector store in the last 24 hours, find a highly similar pair of screens at different times. What were the two times and what changed between them?
Identify the most recent time we left a screen state and later returned to the same state fingerprint (app, window title, key markers). What were leave time, return time, and time away?
